predicate.note: Frames file for 'awaken' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Appropriations committees have used an assortment of devices [*-1] to disguise as much as $ 1 billion [*U*] in spending , and as critics have awakened to these devices , the bill can seem like a wounded caribou trying [*] to make it past ice and wolves [*-3] to reach safer winter grazing .
